entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Hunters Point

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023
